## Wrapper around LibBi
## ======================
## Model:  Baseline 
## Run time:  29385.69  seconds
## Number of samples:  10000 
## State trajectories recorded:  E H L P S T_E T_P YearlyAgeCases YearlyDeaths YearlyECases YearlyEPulCases YearlyPCases YearlyPulCases 
## Noise trajectories recorded:  NoiseNUKCases 
## Parameters recorded:  beta_child_mod beta_older_adult_mod c_eff c_hist M MeasError MeasStd NonUKScaling ProportionLatent YearCurrentEffContact
